title: Steak and five-spice stir-fry
description: Stuck for ideas for something quick and easy to make for dinner tonight? Try this Chinese-inspired stir-fry with fragrant five-spice.

method.Step 1: Thinly slice a 250g sirloin steak. Heat 1 tablespoon sunflower oil in a wok or large non-stick frying pan over a high heat. Add the steak and stir-fry for 2 minutes.

method.Step 2: Stir in 1 tablespoon Chinese five-spice paste, then tip in a 300g pack fresh stir-fry vegetables. Stir-fry for 3 minutes, then add a splash of water. Cook for another minute, then serve with cooked egg noodles, if you like.
